00031 template<class type>
00032 type max_value_of()
00033 {
00034   return 0;
00035 }
00036 
00037 template<>
00038 double max_value_of<double>()
00039 {
00040   return 1.7* pow(10.0,308);
00041 }
00042 
00043 template<>
00044 float max_value_of<float>()
00045 {
00046   return 3.4* pow(10.,38);
00047 }
00048 
00049 template<>
00050 int max_value_of<int>()
00051 {
00052   return (int)pow(2., sizeof(int)*8.)-1;
00053 }
00054 
00055 template<>
00056 long max_value_of<long>()
00057 {
00058   return (long)pow(2., sizeof(long)*8.)-1;
00059 }
00060 
00061 
00062 template<>
00063 unsigned long max_value_of<unsigned long>()
00064 {
00065   return (unsigned long)-1;
00066 }
00067

00069 template<>
00070 unsigned int max_value_of<unsigned int>()
00071 {
00072   return (unsigned int)-1;
00073 }

00075 template<>
00076 unsigned short max_value_of<unsigned short>()
00077 {
00078   return (unsigned short)-1;

00082 template <
00083   class ValueType,
00084   class KeyType = unsigned long,
00085   int MAX_GAP = 3, // 3 means that it's a 1-2-3 skip list. So, 4 means it's 1-2-3-4 skip list
00086   class StorageType=MemStorage,
00087   class LockType=NullLock>
00088 class SkipList : public AccessMethod<KeyType, ValueType, LockType>
00089 {
00090 public:
00091   virtual bool insert(const DataType<KeyType,ValueType>& data) 
00092   {
00093     return false;
00094   }
00095 
00096   virtual bool update(const DataType<KeyType,ValueType>& data)
00097   {
00098     return false;
00099   }
00100 
00101   virtual ValueType* find(const KeyType& key)
00102   {
00103     return false;
00104   }
00105 
00106   virtual bool del(const KeyType& key)
00107   {
00108     return false;
00109   }
00110   
00111 }

00114 
00119 template <
00120   class ValueType,
00121   class KeyType,
00122   int MAX_GAP, // 3 means that it's a 1-2-3 skip list. So, 4 means it's 1-2-3-4 skip list
00123   class LockType>
00124 class SkipList<ValueType, KeyType,MAX_GAP, MemStorage, LockType  >
00125   : public AccessMethod<KeyType, ValueType, LockType>
00126 {
00127   BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT(MAX_GAP>=3);
00131   class SkipNode
00132   {
00133   public:
00134     KeyType key_;
00135     ValueType* pValue_;
00136     SkipNode  *pRight_;
00137     SkipNode  *pDown_;
00138 
00139     SkipNode(const KeyType& key=KeyType(), ValueType* value = 0,
00140              SkipNode *rt = 0, SkipNode *dt = 0)
00141       : key_(key), pValue_(value), pRight_(rt), pDown_(dt) {}
00142 
00143     SkipNode(const SkipNode& node)
00144       : key_(node.key_), pValue_(node.pValue_), pRight_(node.pRight_), pDown_(node.pDown_) {}
00145 
00146     
00147     friend std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& out, const SkipNode& node)
00148       {
00149         out<<node.key_<<":"<<(node.pValue_==0? "NULL" : *node.pValue_);
00150         return out;
00151       }
00152 
00153     ~SkipNode()
00154     {
00155     }
00156 
00157     SkipNode* getRightPtr(int times)
00158     {
00159       SkipNode  * r = pRight_;
00160       while(times>1)
00161       {
00162         r = r->pRight_;
00163         times--;
00164 
00165       }
00166       return r;
00167       
00168     }
00169     
00170 
00171   };
00172 
00173   typedef SkipList<ValueType, KeyType, MAX_GAP,MemStorage, LockType  > Self;
00174   
00175 public:
00176   
00183   explicit SkipList():m_infinity(max_value_of<KeyType>()),pPool_(alloc_)
00184   {
00185     //pBottom_ = new SkipNode();
00186     pBottom_ = BOOST_NEW(alloc_, SkipNode);
00187     pBottom_->pRight_ = pBottom_->pDown_ = pBottom_;
00188     //pTail_   = new SkipNode();
00189     pTail_   = BOOST_NEW(alloc_, SkipNode);
00190     pTail_->pRight_ = pTail_;
00191     pTail_->pDown_ = 0;
00192     pTail_->key_ = m_infinity;//1000001
00193     //pHeader_ = new SkipNode(1000000,0, pTail_, pBottom_);
00194     pHeader_ = BOOST_NEW(alloc_, SkipNode)(m_infinity,0, pTail_, pBottom_);
00195     size_ = 0;
00196     //assert(MAX_GAP>3);
00197   }
00198 
00199 
00200   
00206   SkipList(const Self & rhs)
00207   {
00208     screen << "Copy constructor is unimplemented" << END;
00209   }
00210 
00211   
00215   ~SkipList()
00216   {
00217     release();
00218     pHeader_ = 0;
00219     pTail_ = 0;
00220     pBottom_ = 0;
00221   }
00222   
00223 
00229   const ValueType* find_min( ) const
00230   {
00231     if( is_empty( ) )
00232       return m_infinity;
00233 
00234     SkipNode*current = pHeader_;
00235     while( current->pDown_ != pBottom_ )
00236       current = current->pDown_;
00237 
00238     return (const ValueType*)current->pValue;
00239   }
00240 
00246   const ValueType* find_max( ) const
00247   {
00248     if( is_empty( ) )
00249       return m_infinity;
00250 
00251     SkipNode *current = pHeader_;
00252     for( ; ; ) {
00253       if( current->pRight_->pRight_ != pTail_ )
00254         current = current->pRight_;
00255       else if( current->pDown_ != pBottom_ )
00256         current = current->pDown_;
00257       else
00258         return (const ValueType*)current->pValue;
00259     }
00260 
00261     return 0;
00262   }
00263   
00264   
00265  
00272   virtual ValueType* find( const KeyType& v ) 
00273   {
00274     
00275     SkipNode* x;
00276 
00277     x = pHeader_;
00278     while (x != pBottom_) {
00279       while (compare(v,  x->key_)>0)
00280         x = x->pRight_;
00281       if (x->pDown_ == pBottom_ || v == x->key_)
00282         return ( (v == x->key_) ? (x->pValue_) : 0);
00283       x = x->pDown_;
00284     }
00285 
00286     return 0;
00287   }
00288   
00289   inline const ValueType* find(const KeyType& x)const
00290   {
00291     return (const ValueType*)((SkipList*)this)->find(x);
00292   }
00293 
00299   bool is_empty() const
00300   {
00301     return (size_ == 0);
00302   }
00303   
00307   void display(std::ostream& stream) const
00308   {
00309     SkipNode *level = pHeader_->pDown_;
00310     Size c = 0;
00311     
00312     while(level != pBottom_)
00313     {
00314       stream<<END<<"------------------Level:"<<c<<"-----------------"<<END;
00315       
00316       SkipNode *current = level;
00317       while (current!= pTail_)
00318       {
00319         stream<<*current<<" ";
00320         if (current->pDown_ != pBottom_)
00321           stream<<"-->"<<*current->pDown_;
00322         stream<<"| ";
00323 
00324         current = current->pRight_;
00325       }
00326       c++;
00327       level  = level->pDown_;
00328       
00329     }
00330 
00331     stream<<END;
00332     
00333   }

00336   int getSize() const { return size_; }

00342   void release()
00343   {
00344 //     for (typename std::vector<ValueType*>::iterator i = pPool_.begin(); i!= pPool_.end(); i++)
00345 //      delete *i;
00346     
00347     pHeader_->pRight_ = pTail_;
00348     pHeader_->pDown_ = pBottom_;
00349     pPool_.clear();
00350     
00351   }

00353   virtual bool insert(const DataType<KeyType,ValueType>& data) 
00354   {
00355     return insert(data.key, data.value);
00356     
00357   }
00358   
00359 
00363   virtual bool insert(const KeyType& key, const ValueType& data)
00364   {
00365     
00366     SkipNode*t, *x;
00367 
00368     x = pHeader_;
00369     pBottom_->key_ = key;
00370     //pBottom_->pValue_ = new ValueType(data);
00371     pBottom_->pValue_ = BOOST_NEW(alloc_, ValueType)(data);
00372     
00373     while (x != pBottom_) {
00374       while (compare(key, x->key_)>0)
00375         x = x->pRight_;
00376       if ((x->pDown_ == pBottom_) && (compare(key,x->key_)==0))
00377       {
00378         pBottom_->pValue_ = 0;
00379         return false; // already inserted
00380           
00381       }
00382 
00383 
00384       if ((x->pDown_ == pBottom_) ||
00385           (x->key_ == x->pDown_->getRightPtr(MAX_GAP)->key_)) {
00386         //t = new SkipNode(x->key_, x->pValue_, x->pRight_, x->pDown_->getRightPtr(MAX_GAP-1));
00387         t = BOOST_NEW(alloc_, SkipNode)(x->key_, x->pValue_, x->pRight_, x->pDown_->getRightPtr(MAX_GAP-1));
00388         x->pRight_ = t;
00389         x->key_ = x->pDown_->getRightPtr(MAX_GAP-2)->key_;
00390         x->pValue_ = x->pDown_->getRightPtr(MAX_GAP-2)->pValue_;
00391       }
00392       x = x->pDown_;
00393     }
00394 
00395     if (pHeader_->pRight_ != pTail_) {
00396       // t = new SkipNode(m_infinity,0, pTail_, pHeader_);
00397       t = BOOST_NEW(alloc_, SkipNode)(m_infinity,0, pTail_, pHeader_);
00398       pHeader_ = t;
00399     }
00400 
00401     size_++;
00402     pPool_.push_back(pBottom_->pValue_);
00403     
00404     return true;
00405   }
00406   
00407   virtual bool del(const KeyType& v)
00408   {
00409     
00410     SkipNode* x;
00411     bool r = false;
00412     
00413     x = pHeader_;
00414     while (x != pBottom_) {
00415       while (compare(v,x->key_)>0)
00416         x = x->pRight_;
00417       if (compare(v,x->key_)==0 && x->pValue_!=0)
00418       {
00419         x->pValue_ = 0;
00420         r= true;
00421         
00422       }
00423       
00424       x = x->pDown_;
00425     }
00426 
00427     return r;
00428   }
00429   
00430   virtual bool update(const DataType<KeyType,ValueType>& data)
00431   {
00432     return update(data.key, data.value);
00433     
00434   }
00435   
00436   virtual bool update (const KeyType& key, const ValueType& data)
00437   {
00438     ValueType* v = find(key);
00439     if (v == 0)
00440       return false;
00441     
00442     *v= data;
00443     
00444     return true;
00445     
00446   }
00447

00451 private:
00452   const KeyType m_infinity;
00453 
00454   SkipNode *pHeader_;  // The list
00455   SkipNode *pBottom_;
00456   SkipNode *pTail_;
00457   Size size_;
00458   std::vector<ValueType*, boost::stl_allocator<ValueType*> > pPool_;
00459   boost::scoped_alloc alloc_;
00460   //  std::allocator<ValueType*> alloc_;
00461   
00462   int compare(const KeyType& a, const KeyType& b) const
00463   {
00464     return _compare(a,b, static_cast<boost::is_arithmetic<KeyType>*>(0));
00465   }
00466   int _compare(const KeyType& a, const KeyType& b, const boost::mpl::true_*) const
00467   {
00468     return a-b;
00469   }
00470 
00471   int _compare(const KeyType& a, const KeyType& b, const boost::mpl::false_*) const
00472   {
00473     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT((KeyTypeConcept<KeyType>));
00474     return a.compare(b);
00475   }
